target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME}
PRIVATE
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ActionEvent.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ActionListener.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/BaseTypes.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/BlinkingEvent.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/BorderLayout.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Color.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CursorProvider.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Dimension.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/EmptyWidget.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/EventArgs.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/FlowLayout.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/FocusListener.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/FocusManager.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Font.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Graphics.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/GridLayout.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Gui.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Image.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Input.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyboardListener.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Layout.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/MouseListener.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Point.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Rectangle.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ResizableBorderLayout.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ResizableText.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SelectionListener.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/TableLayout.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/TapListener.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/TopContainer.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Transform.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Widget.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/WidgetListener.cpp
)

add_subdirectory(Clipboard)
add_subdirectory(Widgets)
